TemplateContainer.name: Mammo Template
TemplateContainer.description: This template is used by an application program to present readers and adjudicators with available option for evaluating brain tumor studies

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: 25 - Please mark up the tumor using the ruler tool
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Lesion size is defined as the largest perpendicular (x-y) cross- sectional diameter of entire T2 signal abnormality (longest dimension x perpendicular dimension) measured the single axial image that reveals the largest cross-sectional area of the lesion.
